title: PermaBan.. Really ??
body:
Ok, so I was permanently banned for this.
Game 1
sK Spooky: tf ur gonna have fun
sK Spooky: 33% wr yas with 0.7 kda
sK Spooky: u went 3-14
sK Spooky: 2-16
sK Spooky: lol
sK Spooky: it hurts looking at this
sK Spooky: remake
sK Spooky: lol
sK Spooky: im not gonna give it to xin
sK Spooky: zil reported
sK Spooky: vayne dw
sK Spooky: im on ur side
sK Spooky: report zil
sK Spooky: mute him
sK Spooky: its gg since i saw ur wr
sK Spooky: why play yas
sK Spooky: if ur obv trash
sK Spooky: lol
sK Spooky: ^
sK Spooky: yas wtf
sK Spooky: why are u playing yas
sK Spooky: no its mb
sK Spooky: shouldve dodged
sK Spooky: ty
sK Spooky: not if we dont have a mid
sK Spooky: nah its gg
sK Spooky: im afking soon
sK Spooky: 33% wr yas
sK Spooky: its gg
sK Spooky: we arent gonn win
sK Spooky: the only games he won he got carried
sK Spooky: come
sK Spooky: r
sK Spooky: r
sK Spooky: on
sK Spooky: well he better not say its our fault
sK Spooky: pls
sK Spooky: u needs to learn not to pick yas
sK Spooky: same ehre
sK Spooky: waste of time
sK Spooky: im afk
sK Spooky: cya
sK Spooky: gg
sK Spooky: gg
sK Spooky: plz end
sK Spooky: go
sK Spooky: end
sK Spooky: open
sK Spooky: it is
sK Spooky: gg

this is the terrible yasuo.

replies.body:
sK Spooky: im afking soon
sK Spooky: im afk
sK Spooky: cya

:thinking:

i didnt afk, i said that right at the end of the game

and, if afking was the case, id be banned for afk
Its toxic but It shouldve just been a 14 day suspension not perma ;/ Unless youve done this before then you kinda got what you deserved ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

yeah, sure. But I did not swear, did not cuss. All I said was this Yasuo shouldn't have played ranked because of his terrible winrate. I mean, this is technically intentional feeding, because we DID lose the game because this Yasuo DID go 3-14. 

Simple. Don't play a champion in ranked if you're obviously garbage at the champion.
